name.description: The name to set the price for

owner.description: The owner address of the name

price.description: The new price that this name is valued at and can be purchased for example 100dys. The monthly fee is 1% of this price and will be paid by the owner now. The expiration height is extended by 1 month.

MsgSetPriceAndExtend.title: Msg Set Price And Extend
MsgSetPriceAndExtend.description: Set the price of the name and extend the expiration height
